
### Computing the deviations from expectation

```{r echo=FALSE}
knitr::kable(m - z$expected, format = "html", table.attr = "class='ct_test_table'")

res = abs(m - z$expected)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
knitr::kable(res, format = "html", table.attr = "class='ct_test_table'")
```
